description: Required | Replace TSBs Web Publishing Capabilities with an Open-Source WCMS solution
full_summary:
# Government Tender Announcement
## Solicitation ID: TSB-2023-8056774
### Title: 
Open-source Web Content Analysis and System Management Services

The Transportation Safety Board (TSB) of Canada invites Suppliers to participate in a competitive tendering process for the provision of open-source web content analysis and system management services.

**Project Scope:** 
TSB requires a solution to modernize its web infrastructure and web publishing capabilities by adopting an open-source web content management system (WCMS). The project timeline is estimated to be 6 months, with the expected completion date being March 31, 2024.

**Eligibility Criteria:**

This requirement is set aside for the PSIB framework and is open only to those SBIPS Supply Arrangement Holders (EN537-05IT01) who have qualified under Tier 1 for services in the National Capital Region for the following domains of expertise: 03 - Electronic Services Delivery and/or 07 - Legacy Support and Transition.

**Submitter Details:**

* Contractor Name: (Insert Contractor Name)
* Contracting Entity Name: Transportation Safety Board of Canada
* Contact Name: Yannick Bastonnais
* Contact Email: [Yannick.Bastonnais@bst-tsb.gc.ca](mailto:Yannick.Bastonnais@bst-tsb.gc.ca)
* Contact Phone Number: (819) 664-7553

**Important Dates:**

* Tender Closing Date: June 23, 2023, at 14:00 hours (Eastern Standard Time)
* Expected Contract Start Date: July 31, 2023
* Expected Contract End Date: March 29, 2024

**Document Attachments:**

Tender notice attachments for solicitation ID: TSB-2023-8056774 can be found at the following URL: <https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/6163/sbips_npp_-_analysis-of-wcmc.pdf> (English) and <https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/6163/sbips_npp_-_analysis-of-wcmc-fr.pdf> (French)

**Note:** This tender has expired. Suppliers are no longer able to submit a response.
